sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特别的浓香，口感如鲍鱼，极润滑爽口。

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸钼和钙化合物在润滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: Filters for fuel oil, lube oil, hydraulic power line oil, cutting oil.
sentences.chinese: 用于燃油，润滑油，液压油切削油的过滤器。

sentences.english: Annular groove and three lubrication holes in the outer ring; covered with a polymer band.
sentences.chinese: 外圈带环形槽和三个润滑孔，有聚合物带覆盖。

sentences.english: Oil-based lubricants can weaken latex condoms and cause them to break.
sentences.chinese: 油基润滑剂会削弱橡胶安全套并引起破裂。

sentences.english: High temperature rated grease is standard for extended bearing life.
sentences.chinese: 高温润滑脂是标准的额定延长轴承寿命。

sentences.english: A: Self-lubricated bushing is very popular in western countries.
sentences.chinese: 自动润滑轴套在西方国家很流行。

sentences.english: Determines the resistance of lubricating grease to flow under prescribed conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在规定条件下测量润滑油脂的抗移动性。

sentences.english: Weighing mechanism shall be temperature compensating and shall have automatic dampener to reduce oscillations.
sentences.chinese: 称重的机械装置应有温度修正和自动润滑以减少震动。

sentences.english: A novel grease additive derivative of thiadiazole was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成了一种新型润滑脂添加剂噻二唑衍生物。

sentences.english: How do I dispose my used oils and greases?
sentences.chinese: 我该如何处理废油和废润滑脂？

sentences.english: Smooth and beautiful, Zhonghua high quality pencil!
sentences.chinese: 中华铅笔，品质优良，书写润滑，美观大方。

sentences.english: Applied to engine circulatory system. Anti-corrosion. Economic durability.
sentences.chinese: 引擎循环系统专用润滑油，防锈蚀，经济耐用。

sentences.english: Mineral filled, toughened, lubricated polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding. It has exceptaional surface aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 矿物填充，增韧，润滑聚对苯二甲酸丁二酯树脂注塑。

sentences.english: The categories of the lubricated duplicators are intricate.
sentences.chinese: 那些润滑过的复印机的种类错综复杂。
